Search results
Eleven randomized clinical trials were included in our meta-analysis, with a total sample population of 2199 patients analyzed. Within the subgroups, the amiodarone subgroup had 1308 patients, while the combination of amiodarone and beta-blocker or combination subgroup contained 891 patients. Studies by Solomon et al., Tokmakoglu et al., Bigdelian et al., Sleilaty et al., Halonen et al., and Onk et al. have analyzed the efficacy and safety of amiodarone alone versus beta-blockers.20., 21., 22.,
